**As a** [role]
**I need**  [feature]
**so that** [benefit]    # business value

### Details and Assumption 

* [document what you know]

### Acceptance criteria

```gherkin
Given [some context]
When [certain action is taken]
Then [the outcome of the action is observed]
```
